name: Last Stitch Goodnight
description: Last Stitch Goodnight is a side scrolling action adventure that embraces a new mythology. After a near-death experience, you are kidnapped by a doctor who is experimenting on people who satisfy certain criteria. Escape will require new weapons, powers, and a strong stomach for bad science.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0)
